content: watsonx.governance. 26 Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM watsonx.governance © Copyright IBM Corp. 2025. 27 Chapter 3. Implementing AI governance strategy Artificial Intelligence (AI) governance is a multifaceted process that ensures AI systems are developed and deployed responsibly and ethically. This chapter provides a comprehensive overview of the end-to-end AI lifecycle governance process, exploring the various steps involved in achieving this goal. This chapter contains the following sections:  “Understanding the end-to-end AI lifecycle governance process” on page 28  “Elements of model risk governance” on page 29  “Considerations to implement AI governance strategy” on page 37 3 28 Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM watsonx.governance 3.1 Understanding the end-to-end AI lifecycle governance process This section describes the governance process which is divided into two primary levels: macro and micro as shown in Figure 3-1. Figure 3-1 End-to-end AI lifecycle governance process
